long_description: Wall map of New Mexico features gradation coloring representing changes in altitude and three-dimensional shading for relief. Presented in 1/550,000 scale with one-inch equal to approximately nine miles; shows cities, pueblos and major roadways. Raven Maps and Images; copyright 1988, revised in 1991. Measures 45 x 52 inches. Although there is amazing detail, the map remains completely uncluttered when viewed from more than a few feet away. Whether displayed in a home, school or office, these maps are sure to attract attention; the perfect gift.
short_description: Wall map of New Mexico features gradation coloring representing changes in altitude and three-dimensional shading for relief.
